title.narrative: Engaged Citizens to enhance scrutiny of public expenditure and hold Government to account (ECP) Long Term + Short Term Consultancies.

description.narrative: This activity ( Engaged Citizens to enhance scrutiny of public expenditure and hold Government to account (ECP) Long Term + Short Term Consultancies.) is a component of Partnership to Engage, Reform and Learn (PERL) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £47,165,173. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Democratic participation and civil society, Energy research, Education policy and administrative management, Women's equality organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 02-05-2016 and the end date is 30-04-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2018 Quarter 4
